languages.text: {n}Вы посвящаете некоторое время проверке того, как {petname} выполняет базовые команды. Кибермастиф в точности следует вашим указаниям, не оставляя сомнений, что сервопротоколы в норме... и все же небольшое отклонение от нормы есть: зверь постоянно помахивает хвостом, словно искренне рад провести с вами время.{/n}

{n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы посвящаете некоторое время проверке того, как {petname} выполняет базовые команды. Кибермастиф в точности следует вашим указаниям, не оставляя сомнений, что сервопротоколы в норме... и все же небольшое отклонение от нормы есть: зверь постоянно помахивает хвостом, словно искренне рад провести с вами время.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}が基本的なコマンドをどのように実行するかを、少し時間をかけて学んだ。サイバーマスチフはあなたの指示に正確に従い、サーボプロトコルの正常さを裏付けた…しかし、ひとつだけ通常とは異なる点があった。犬の尻尾が絶えず振られていたのだ。まるで{petname}があなたと一緒に過ごせることを喜んでいるかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}が基本的なコマンドをどのように実行するかを、少し時間をかけて学んだ。サイバーマスチフはあなたの指示に正確に従い、サーボプロトコルの正常さを裏付けた…しかし、ひとつだけ通常とは異なる点があった。犬の尻尾が絶えず振られていたのだ。まるで{petname}があなたと一緒に過ごせることを喜んでいるかのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es dauert eine Weile, bis du gelernt hast, wie {petname} einfache Befehle ausführt. Der Cyber-Mastiff befolgt deine Anweisungen exakt, und du bist sicher, dass die Servoprotokolle korrekt funktionieren ... und dennoch ist da eine kleine Abweichung von der Norm: Der Hund wedelt mit dem Schwanz, als freue {petname} sich darüber, Zeit mit dir zu verbringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es dauert eine Weile, bis du gelernt hast, wie {petname} einfache Befehle ausführt. Der Cyber-Mastiff befolgt deine Anweisungen exakt, und du bist sicher, dass die Servoprotokolle korrekt funktionieren ... und dennoch ist da eine kleine Abweichung von der Norm: Der Hund wedelt mit dem Schwanz, als freue {petname} sich darüber, Zeit mit dir zu verbringen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous prenez le temps d'enseigner à {petname} quelques ordres de base. Le cyber-mastiff suit vos ordres à la lettre, achevant de vous convaincre que ses servo-protocoles fonctionnent à la perfection... et pourtant, vous remarquez une chose étrange : la queue du chien ne cesse de remuer, comme si {petname} appréciait de passer du temps avec vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous prenez le temps d'enseigner à {petname} quelques ordres de base. Le cyber-mastiff suit vos ordres à la lettre, achevant de vous convaincre que ses servo-protocoles fonctionnent à la perfection... et pourtant, vous remarquez une chose étrange : la queue du chien ne cesse de remuer, comme si {petname} appréciait de passer du temps avec vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dedicas un tiempo a aprender cómo ejecuta {petname} las órdenes más básicas. El cibermastín sigue tus instrucciones al pie de la letra, por lo que concluyes que sus servoprotocolos funcionan correctamente... y sin embargo adviertes una ligera desviación de la norma: {petname} no deja de menear el rabo, como si disfrutase de tu compañía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dedicas un tiempo a aprender cómo ejecuta {petname} las órdenes más básicas. El cibermastín sigue tus instrucciones al pie de la letra, por lo que concluyes que sus servoprotocolos funcionan correctamente... y sin embargo adviertes una ligera desviación de la norma: {petname} no deja de menear el rabo, como si disfrutase de tu compañía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你花了些时间，学习如何让{petname}执行基本命令。你的生化獒犬始终都在完美地按照你的命令行事，你确信它的伺服协议没有任何问题……不过，它还是有一点点偏离常态的地方。整个训练过程中，{petname}一直在摇着尾巴，似乎很高兴能和你在一起。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köpeğin temel komutları nasıl gerçekleştirdiğini anlamak için biraz vakit ayırıyorsun. Siber mastif talimatlarına harfi harfine uyuyor, böylece hizmoprotokollerin tıkır tıkır işlediğini anlıyorsun. Yine de ufak bir sapma olduğunu fark ediyorsun. {petname} seninle geçirdiği vakitten memnunmuşçasına kuyruğunu sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take some time to learn how {petname} executes basic commands. The cyber-mastiff follows your exact instructions, leaving you convinced that the servo-protocols are working correctly... and yet there is a small deviation from the norm: the dog's tail keeps wagging, as if {petname} were pleased to be spending time with you.{/n}
